header.note: This is the sentence alignement file for THE-theses.fr-2019MON30026. segId begin by 1, tuid = segId

tuv.seg: Ce travail de recherche vise à étudier les usages linguistiques non standard de certains scripteurs peu lettrées pendant la Grande Guerre, à partir de leurs correspondances privées.
This work focuses on the non-standard linguistic usages of less-literate writers during the First World War, based on their private correspondence.
